pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate Cognitive Diagnostic Model ('CDM') Data // Provides efficient R and 'C++' routines to simulate cognitive diagnostic model data for Deterministic Input, Noisy "And" Gate ('DINA') and reduced Reparameterized Unified Model ('rRUM') from Culpepper and Hudson (2017) doi: 10.1177/0146621617707511, Culpepper (2015) doi:10.3102/1076998615595403, and de la Torre (2009) doi:10.3102/1076998607309474.
